name: Advanced Education With Victor Strobovski Chapter 2: The Paradox

description:
Story

When you escaped Victors advanced school you went to his schoolhouse again and it was 50 YEARS FUTURE!!!!!!!!! and Victor was kidnapped and was stuck in an 50 years future he tried to escape 50 years future but he suddenly found a portion and he drink it and he became very fat and was unable to escape to escape his school collect 22 notebooks and escape the 50 years future
